product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Designed for active sports in cool weather, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Long Underwear Crew Top is a great option for days when even lightweight base layers are too hot. Stretchy, quick-drying and moisture wicking, the polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation against skin. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays; fabric treatment helps deter odors. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing; thumb loops secure sleeves while layering. The men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Long Underwear Crew Top has a slim fit.
short_description: Designed for active sports in cool weather, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Graphic Long Underwear Crew Top is a great option for days when even lightweight base layers are too hot.
